data.name: Towards The Pantheon - Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Towards The Pantheon's soundtrack spans a wide variety of genres from orchestral to electronic to noise and industrial - all the while retaining a stylistic theme that fits with the unique world of the game! Containing over 2.5 hours of original music, Towards The Pantheon's soundtrack will delight fans of both old school and modern gaming music with its twists, turns, and uncompromising purpose.

Tracklist:
1. The First Step (1:30)
2. Grandpa's Goodbye (2:26)
3. Villagers, Speedsters, and Famallamas (2:06)
4. Alone By The Campfire (1:26)
5. The Torches Of Marion (2:54)
6. Onto Greener Pastures (1:57)
7. Save Tent (2:44)
8. Time To Fight! (2:55)
9. A Trygohl Blocks The Path (2:02)
10. Away From home (1:38)
11. Frozen Memories (1:58)
12. Bam's House! (1:30)
13. Freyja's New Friend (2:12)
14. The FireClaw Realms (2:54)
15. Cities Full Of Kitties (1:29)
16. Giddy Up, It's Speedster Time! (0:54)
17. Broken Homes (0:59)
18. Lost In The Blizzard (1:52)
19. Battle For Lord Purrington's Jewel (1:52)
20. Is Hope Lost (1:12)
21. The Valley Of The Darken (2:12)
22. What Is Next (1:08)
23. Autumn Leaves (2:32)
24. Border War (2:43)
25. Mishima's Broken Heart (0:39)
26. Hacker Planet (3:18)
27. Night Thoughts (2:14)
28. The Underground Path (1:54)
29. Rioters & Biker Bozos (2:07)
30. Warmth (2:36)
31. Onwards To Adventure! (1:34)
32. The Ghost Who Escaped Eternity (1:42)
33. Four By The Campfire (1:04)
34. Into The Smog (5:52)
35. The Rumours Of Mork Helle (3:35)
36. Where Man Once Stood Proud (2:37)
37. Knowing What Is Next (2:00)
38. Towards The Katharos Estate (2:00)
39. The Hanger's Hymn (2:26)
40. He Is Watching (3:34)
41. The Hollow Hearted (1:28)
42. She Is Waiting (0:57)
43. Broken Knees (3:06)
44. A Call To Arms (2:12)
45. The Fear Of Failure (2:29)
46. Svanhild Needed You (0:58)
47. Black Plague Inside (3:00)
48. Can You Honour Your Name (0:51)
49. A Family's Love (2:53)
50. Shades Of Flesh (2:31)
51. Proving Grounds (3:35)
52. Free... For Now (2:14)
53. Losing Biggles (2:00)
54. Outsider Beware (1:21)
55. Get Lost (0:55)
56. We H(a)unt Ourselves (2:05)
57. The Mission... (3:24)
58. The Propaganda... (1:15)
59. The Shame. (3:00)
60. We Found Each Other (2:14)
61. Before Life Had Faded (1:16)
62. Desecrate The Family (3:02)
63. The Final Campfire (3:36)
64. Ascending Through Hel (0:56)
65. At Last (1:58)
66. Torrick's Heir (1:43)
67. For Keltoi! (3:34)
68. His Time Here Is Up (2:14)
69. Towards The Picnic (4:51)

Once purchased and installed you can find the MP3 files by going to your library in Steam, right clicking Towards The Pantheon and selecting Properties > Local Files > Browse Local Files.

data.short_description: The Towards The Pantheon soundtrack contains over 2.5 hours of music from the game by Connor O.R.T. Linning. From chiptunes to orchestra pieces to breakbeats to industrial drone, the Towards The Pantheon soundtrack has its share of twists and turns while exploring leitmotifs and concepts!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Any
  • Processor: They process things
  • Memory: 1 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Storage: 350 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
